article:
The '1982–83 Football League Cup' was the twenty-second season of the
Football League Cup, a knockout competition for England's top 92 football clubs.
The competition started on the 30th August 1982 and ended with the final 26th
March 1983.

The final was contested by First Division teams Manchester United and Liverpool
at Wembley Stadium in London.
